name: @herbie/tracker
description: Herbie Telemetry Agent - Windows telemetry collection for rFactor 2

scripts.dev: echo '⏭️  Tracker dev mode skipped (Windows-only)' && echo '   Use Windows machine to run: python herbie_agent_launcher.py'
scripts.install: python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt 2>/dev/null || python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:deps: python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt 2>/dev/null || python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.lint: (python3 -m black --check herbie_agent/ && python3 -m ruff check herbie_agent/) 2>/dev/null || (python -m black --check herbie_agent/ && python -m ruff check herbie_agent/)
scripts.lint:fix: (python3 -m black herbie_agent/ && python3 -m ruff check --fix herbie_agent/) 2>/dev/null || (python -m black herbie_agent/ && python -m ruff check --fix herbie_agent/)
scripts.typecheck: python3 -m mypy herbie_agent/ --ignore-missing-imports 2>/dev/null || python -m mypy herbie_agent/ --ignore-missing-imports
scripts.test: python3 -m pytest tests/ -v 2>/dev/null || python -m pytest tests/ -v
scripts.clean: python3 -c "import shutil; import os; [shutil.rmtree(d, ignore_errors=True) for d in ['build', 'dist', '__pycache__', '.pytest_cache']]" 2>/dev/null || python -c "import shutil; import os; [shutil.rmtree(d, ignore_errors=True) for d in ['build', 'dist', '__pycache__', '.pytest_cache']]"
scripts.setup: (python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt && python3 -c "print('✅ Herbie Telemetry Agent dependencies installed successfully!')") 2>/dev/null || (python -m pip install -r requirements.txt && python -c "print('✅ Herbie Telemetry Agent dependencies installed successfully!')")
scripts.check-deps: python3 -c "import importlib.util; import sys; missing=[p for p in ['PyQt6','pystray','httpx','pydantic','structlog'] if importlib.util.find_spec(p) is None]; sys.exit(1) if missing and print(f'❌ Missing: {", ".join(missing)}') else print('✅ All dependencies available')" 2>/dev/null || python -c "import importlib.util; import sys; missing=[p for p in ['PyQt6','pystray','httpx','pydantic','structlog'] if importlib.util.find_spec(p) is None]; sys.exit(1) if missing and print(f'❌ Missing: {", ".join(missing)}') else print('✅ All dependencies available')"
